services.title: Storyboarding
services.shortDescription: Detailed visual planning for your learning content
services.fullDescription: Professional storyboard creation that serves as the blueprint for your e-learning projects. I develop detailed visual and narrative frameworks that clearly communicate the learning flow, interactions, assessments, and multimedia elements, ensuring all stakeholders are aligned before development begins.

services.title: E-learning Development
services.shortDescription: Custom interactive learning modules tailored to your needs
services.fullDescription: I create comprehensive e-learning solutions from concept to completion. This includes needs analysis, learning objective development, content creation, interactive element design, and final module delivery. Each project is built with responsive design principles and follows accessibility standards to ensure optimal learning experiences across all devices and learner abilities.

services.title: LMS Support
services.shortDescription: Complete learning management system setup and optimization
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive LMS support including system selection, installation, configuration, and ongoing maintenance. I help organizations choose the right LMS platform, customize it to their needs, train administrators, and provide ongoing technical support to ensure smooth operation and maximum user engagement.

services.title: SCORM Packaging
services.shortDescription: Standards-compliant content for seamless LMS integration
services.fullDescription: Expert SCORM packaging services ensuring your learning content meets industry standards and works seamlessly across different LMS platforms. I handle all technical aspects of SCORM compliance, including progress tracking, scoring, and completion criteria, while testing thoroughly across multiple systems.

services.title: Game-Based Learning
services.shortDescription: Engaging gamified learning experiences that drive results
services.fullDescription: I design and develop engaging game-based learning experiences that combine education with entertainment. These solutions incorporate game mechanics like points, badges, leaderboards, and storylines to increase learner engagement and knowledge retention while maintaining clear learning objectives.
